entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High 16. Wind chill minus 5 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. A few rain showers beginning this evening then changing to 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 40 gusting to 70 late this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning then sunny. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the morning then becoming light in the afternoon. High 14. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
